website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful butterfly set made from ceramic that will make your child feel like a big kid.
pros: Made from real ceramic, but not fragile
Can be used with real food and drink
Lets your children feel like they are using "real" cups and saucers
cons: The set does not come with a carrying case

customer_reviews.title: The right child size & can use with real food yay!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for! Real teacups that can be used with real food that are small enough for little hands but not made for dolls. I searched through so many and almost gave up and ordered real adult sized ones for my little girls princess tea party but I found these! They came quickly and were a big hit. She has already shattered 2 of the 4 cups and a lid to the milk vase but at this great price point I'll just buy another! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality tea set that gets used years later!
customer_reviews.text: How does a kids teas set manage to last for 4 years? Well because it's well made. My daughter played with daily/weekly for years, and everything is still in perfect shape. No chips or cracks, everything is still in great shape. That's a testament to the quality of the ceramics here. It looks great and your child will get years of enjoyment out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Jessii

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. My daughter loves loves loves this and I enjoyed making the tea for her and sitting with her as we drank the tea and ate corn bread I baked. Perfect size and strong. I hand washed them after use. My daughter is 5 years and I just supervise her when she uses it. Love the designs on the front of it. Got it during the holidays so I didn't pay 30.00 dollars; much cheaper and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in between size
customer_reviews.text: The teacups are perfect in size for my 5yo. We have another set she used hard, but the cups were so small. These cups are larger, but not full sized, so of course she is able to fill them several times during our tea parties (which is part of the fun!)
customer_reviews.author: Dairy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Saved Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I wasted $22.00 on a set that was so small it would work for a Barbie doll. I knew my 4 year old would be broken hearted. She really wanted a fancy... not plastic tea set for Christmas. I found this set for $11.00 and it came in two days saving the day. It’s perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: and we love it it's perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I just got the tea set, and we love it it's perfect size, it's very cute. The only thing I will say is if anybody got theirs broken is because of the mailman lol,so the packaging should be better more bubble wrapped around it, because I just saw my mailman throwing the Box on my porch but we got lucky and nothing happen to our set and is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Tea party time!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old adores her new tea set. The cups are an excellent size for my 3 kids ages 3, 5, and 7. A nice, sturdy feels adds to the adult-like nature of the cups. The design is well done and is centered on each piece. I am super happy with this product and we've been through a lot of tea sets!! I'd like to get a second set as a backup but I'm not sure I'll need to considering how sturdy the set is.
customer_reviews.author: RCat

customer_reviews.title: Great little tea set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three year old and wasn’t sure how she’d do with it. Pleasantly surprised! It’s a great, durable little set. She has not stopped playing with it since we got it a week ago. We love that you can add tea/water to it and it’s washable. We luckily got it when it was on sale although I’d pay full price if I had to buy again. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: TheLuntFamily

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than the rest!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tea set for our 4 almost 5 yo girls and everything I ordered (even with good ratings) was crap.. too small, already broken, un-even and poorly made baskets, etc... anyway- if you are looking for a tea set that is (yes breakable) thick, big enough to drink from and not feel ridiculous this is IT! Cute design, tough and thick, holds more "tea" than any other. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for older kids!
customer_reviews.text: We didn't like that it was ceramic (really didn't read it closely before ordering). While we LOVE the aesthetic, we will send this home with Grandma for her china cabinet, to be for BIG GIRL tea parties once our LO gets older. We reordered another tea set, which arrived before Christmas, that was plastic and more appropriate for daily pretend play. Glad we opened the package well before Christmas Eve! =)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The size is one step up from her first play set
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter eats really well when we throw a tea party. I can sneak in all the vegs and proteins I need for her so this set is going to really be fun for her. It is larger than her last set but this will be so much better as she actually will get some fluids with these cups. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tea Set – favorite Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my 3 years old niece and she is obsessed with it. She had a few other plastic sets before we tried this one and most of them leaked or couldn’t keep any liquids. This set is wonderful, just what we need it to keep a toddler busy at playtime. Also, I order right before Christmas the delivered day was supposed to be on the 27th which was okay for me because my niece was not going to be home until the 29th but for my surprised they delivered the package within 3 days. This Set was certainly above my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Broken teacup upon delivery-not even in the box
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter just opened her tea set, only to find that the handle of one of the tea cups was gone. Not only was it broken off, but it was not even in the box to try to glue back on. It would appear the box was closed and sent out with a broken cup! How Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: This was adorable and well made until my 4-year-old dropped it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable and well made until my 4-year-old dropped it on the hearth. Yes, it is breakable, in case you were wondering! But it’s cute enough we kept the pieces that survived. It was dishwasher safe and fully functional. The pot held a little more than some sets I’ve dealt with, which was nice because I didn’t have to fill it quite so often.
customer_reviews.author: J. Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broke
customer_reviews.text: I already own one set and we love it so much I ordered another. It came broken in the box 3 cups and creamer 😢. Might have been done in delivery not sure they thru boxes on my concrete porch caught them on camera and I was hm they didn't knock. How rude but product is great when not delivered broken
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but it was USED.  I ordered NEW.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a NEW tea set... NOT USED. What I received was definitely not new. It looked like lipstick marks on the teacup rim. The bottom of each item had a lot of chalk build-up on it. There were marks on the handles. Exactly, how is this new?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle-Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7yr and 3yr girls and they love them! It seems to be a pretty sturdy set and have held up very well to the rough handling. They are a nice size for pretend play or even a real tea party. The tea pot holds a cup of liquid and the cups hold an ounce and the packaging does state that it is "food contact safe."
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this set!!! She is 4 1/2 yrs old. They are very sturdy for ceramic dishes in my opinion. The only reason I'm not rating it a 5 is that it first arrived broken and I had to return it and repurchase once the refund came through on the gift car. Although Amazing made the whole return process EXTREMELY simple!! Only the teapot was broken. They are slightly smaller than actual teacups and saucers, and the pot, cream and sugar containers are petite also, but just perfect for a little girls imagination!!!! Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Huber

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say she loved it. Within 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece. Needless to say she loved it. Within 5 minutes, dropped a cup on the hard kitchen floor and it didn't even chip, crack, or break. These are study and a bit thicker than regular tea cups, making them more durable for a child's use. And the pattern is cute and colorful, perfect for a 5 year old princess.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! I searched high and low for the right tea set for our 3 year old's Christmas present, and this was it. It's porcelain, so she has to treat it a little more carefully than she does her other kitchen toys, but it's still extremely hardy. (I had read about potentially harmful ingredients in tin tea sets, which is why I went with porcelain.) Also, I think it was a terrific price, so I won't be squeamish about buying a replacement set. While small, it's large enough to use with real food and juice (her pretend tea). It's only the middle of January, but she has gotten so much fun out of this set already!!
customer_reviews.author: Sain&Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Tea set is beautiful but is real glass so should be bought for girls who will be careful.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter asked for a tea set for Christmas. This is not plastic so I told her she has to be careful. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hunter

customer_reviews.title: This product is a hazard because it breaks easily. During regular playing 2 pieces broke within 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a hazard because it breaks easily. During regular playing 2 pieces broke within 3 days. I threw the whole set away after I cut my self picking up. The ceramic is rather thin and not made for children's play. Don't buy this product !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White isn't a true white
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for white tea party set. The size is perfect but I don't like the white tone they used. The white is unappealing. It looks very grey. I'm using it as a focal point in my daughter's nursery which is why I'm being more picky than usual. If you aren't using it for decoration and are simply gifting it for play, then it's good. As a decoration piece it looks kind of cheap. I'm not going to return it because I still do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Bombard

customer_reviews.title: Cute but beware of inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a decent quality as a toy but what they sent me looks like a repaired version of damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Goltuk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful 1st tea Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is Darling. We bought if for our granddaughter. She is just 1, so we will move slowly using it. We love that is is a service for 4. We look forward to many little tea parties with she, her brother, her Pap and I. It looks like really nice quality... even at that price. We will be looking for a sweet little basket to put it in. It arrived within a few days and was packed well. A great value... I would buy it again! 💗
customer_reviews.author: acg

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: These are well made. Cute design. My 5 yr old loves to have tea parties and has gone through several sets. These work better than others she's had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was hesitant to buy, however I’m glad I made the purchase. I bought this for my 5 year old niece and she loves it. The product isn’t too small and turned out to be pretty durable!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just like picture, but had a broken piece :(
customer_reviews.text: The tea set I received is just like the picture, except that the product says for ages 3+ on mine. This was purchased as a gift for my daughter, turning 5. My only complaint is that when she opened the gift there was a broken piece inside. The tea pot lid was broken almost in half, which we didn't realize until it was unwrapped. The rest of the set looks and works well!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Tea time
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little tea set. My 3 year old loves having tea parties so I ordered her this set. It’s perfect and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CLOUTS5

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My sons friend travels out of the country every year for xmas and adopted several families for Christmas gifts; we Purchased as a gift for an 8 year old girl. Very Cute set and fast delivery ! Great Gift - was the best set on amazon for price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Carole Yingling

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old twins really enjoyed getting the tea set for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old twins really enjoyed getting the tea set for Christmas. We have had a tea party every day. We all like that its sturdy and big enough to use for real tea.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea party set
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea party set! I bought it for my daughter who only used it a couple times but I am still giving it a 5 star because I like the design and the feel of the cups when we used it.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Should have gave it five stars but is should come in a closable container other that that we have had some great tea times
customer_reviews.author: Amanda kennerly

customer_reviews.title: The tea cups are perfect size for her and her older brother for their ...
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this for my 5 year old daughter, and she will not put it down. The tea cups are perfect size for her and her older brother for their tea time. Very sturdy construction makes me only worry about poor handling on my kids part, not on the item itself. I highly recommend this product for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Just_Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great China set
customer_reviews.text: So adorable this se5 is great quality and very pretty . I ordered two so I could keep one for a future gift . I had one just like this as a child . The receiver of 5his absolutely loved it .
customer_reviews.author: Doorah10

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter loved her tea set! It is perfect for small hands and big imagination. Great price and quality. I love that the box is used for storage.
customer_reviews.author: MomC

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Cute & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 & 3 1/2 great granddaughters absolutely loved this . It was perfect for them . I think it’ll be even better when they don’t have to be closely supervised since it’s breakable . It is sturdy & I recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Lou Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea set
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea set, as does my 4y/o daughter. We have "tea" parties several times a week. We usually use actual water for the "tea", giving her the opportunity practice pouring, and serving. Also she is learning how to carefully use delicate items. On rare occasions, I put COOL tea into the pot and we have real tea parties. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lookingfor wideshoes

customer_reviews.title: Cute Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was delighted with this tea set. She wanted a "real" not plastic one, and this fit the bill. The design is cute and it is the perfect size for her to have tea parties with her friends. Very happy with this purchase and the price could not be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Small, but okay for price.
customer_reviews.text: The set was pretty impressive for the price, but one cup did come damaged, which is dissappointing and makes me question the durability. It's also much smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: For decoration only for show in girls room.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for a young lady who did loves it. I told her for her eyes only and she is old enough that she doesn't want to play tea party anyways with those little cups 👀
customer_reviews.author: Isiah

customer_reviews.title: Just the right cup of tea!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. The ceramic is thinner than the one I bought my daughter 20 years ago so it is a little more fragile. The grandkids love playing "party" with this set. Teaching them "gentle and careful" are a must if one is to avoid breaking. Feels more like real dishes which is not a bad thing and is what I was looking for. Am so tired of "plastic" everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea set! I purchased it as a Christmas gift for my 6 year old. I purchased one from another site and it was tiny! Like Barbie doll size. This set is the perfect size. We haven’t played with them yet but if they aren’t easily broken then I consider this purchase a win! The butterfly design is beautiful also.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A year later and she still plays with this set. And nothing has broken or chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Geek

customer_reviews.title: great gift for little girl
customer_reviews.text: The tea pot pours and it is a perfect little set for a tea party for 4. My 4yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic is thick. I was worried about my daughter breaking it, but I think this is sturdy enough for her. This is exactly what I wanted for her. It is super cute, and nice quality. The price is just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute tea set
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and my daughter loved it. I took one star out because the inside is not coated so it stained.
customer_reviews.author: Fiva

customer_reviews.title: teaparty
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise for my girls. they love love it and play with it almost every night.
customer_reviews.author: Squeakerroo

customer_reviews.title: Impresses
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and loves tea parties! I ordered 2 sets and they both came together and in tact. My daughter is going yo love them on our family tea party dinner!! They are even more beautiful in person than in the picture
customer_reviews.author: CharLee

customer_reviews.title: Fun tea parties with our girl!
customer_reviews.text: We love this with our 4 yr old. Cups are the perfect size for little hands and since it's not super expensive, if one breaks it would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: recipient loved it
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest plates for tea cakes, cookies or small sandwiches. If you use the enclosed plates there are no saucers for the tea cups. Really must have both for a proper tea! And a redesign of the spout would be nice - it drips a little every time you pour. But, all in all, the granddaughter loved it and had a tea party Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: klb

customer_reviews.title: Nice item but came with a broken piece
customer_reviews.text: This item was for my daughter's birthday and I ordered it on a special sale date. The package looked okay but when she opened it for her birthday, she was disappointed to see one of the pieces inside was broken. Window for returns is over and now we are stuck with an incomplete set.
customer_reviews.author: alex furner

customer_reviews.title: This purple butterfly tea set is so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and my granddaughter loves it! This purple butterfly tea set is so cute! It is made of inexpensive ceramic, so may break eventually, but for an 8 year old who likes tea sets, it is a perfect starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne K. Endres

customer_reviews.title: Great set for kids
customer_reviews.text: Adorable gift for little who uses all the time! Easy to clean and durable
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Porcelain Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a tea set for my 5 year old granddaughter. She loves nature so the butterfly was the perfect theme. She loved it. Just the right size for little hands. It is porcelain, so needs to be handled with care. It had everything we needed to enjoy our tea party: 4 cups with saucers, teapot with lid, sugar bowl with lid, and creamer. We had a great time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Nana

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Works well for ages 4-8. Small, but not tiny like some. Very usable
customer_reviews.author: Lariat Charioteer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: Most sets are soooo very small ... this set is great cups hold about 2.5 ozs. and tea pot holds a lot too replaced one I purchased before ... Lovely butterfly design My Grandaughter Loves It.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer  lois lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Great as a gift but definitely for a little older of a child since the ceramic is breakable
customer_reviews.author: Mr Keegan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old requested a tea set for Christmas. There are plenty of cheaply made teas sets out there but this is not one of them. It was well worth the price and she loves it! It came exactly as shown. Its perfect! I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: andrea s.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping these would be durable, but most were broken within the week. Will go with a different company next time.
customer_reviews.author: Long time consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly and safe. Excellent solid quality. Bought for a Christmas gift for Toys for Tots December 2018. I will fill the cups and tea pot with kids jewelry and barrettes.
customer_reviews.author: patricia h.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely loves it! It is so cute and I love that it is a safe and non toxic material.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy mama

customer_reviews.title: Cute Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my niece and she loves it, as other reviews have mentioned the size of the tea cups are nice and kids can have a little tea party, without the "tea" spilling everywhere. Plates can fit a small cookie or other snacks, Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ab P

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money buying this. I bought this with intention of giving it to my daughter for her birthday. It got here early which I was happy about but picking up the box you could hear that it was shattered. EVERY SINGLE PIECE had a chip or was broken!! Beyond upset with this purchase. If I could give it a half a star I would!
customer_reviews.author: Megan G Christie

customer_reviews.title: The cuttest little tea set
customer_reviews.text: Our girl loves this set, it has purple butterflies on it and she loves it. Very nice. Very cute. Adorable. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dream CatcherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute and kiddo is happy
customer_reviews.text: Probably my own fault for getting ceramic but I’m so scared it’s gunna break. But it’s adorable and my kids love it. Also the inserts broke when my youngest took it out of the box so they are “floating” in the box while stored again probably my fault for not taking everything out myself but 🤷‍♀️.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha wood

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Child’s Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable tea set for a young child. The design is pretty and the quality is very nice. The size of the tea cups seems to be larger than some other sets I looked at. I’ve bought this set for my granddaughter and for friends who have granddaughters. Hope to make lots of memories having lots of tea parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful set. I was hesitant to order because of a review said the cup was too thick. It's not, it's just right. Its perfect for little 4 to 6 yr olds!
customer_reviews.author: Meuy

customer_reviews.title: Hand washing is best for small parts.
customer_reviews.text: Love the delicate look! My daughter loves the realness this set! We love playing tea time and getting to use real tea!
customer_reviews.author: Annette S.

customer_reviews.title: Tea Time
customer_reviews.text: Little girls always need a good tea time. Big girl style just the right size for our granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Cutest ceramic tea set!
customer_reviews.text: This teas set is ADORABLE!! Perfect size for little hands and has so many fun things. I was looking for a decent priced ceramic set and I couldn’t believe the price and quality of this set when we received it. My daughter LOVES this so much! One of the best toy purchases we’ve made.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica_rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my five year old but I opened the box today and one was broken so I'm contacting Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute tea set for little girls
customer_reviews.text: This tea set is a lot cuter in person, and it has everything you need for a tea party:) My daughters are going to freak out 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Erin wood

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a real tea set and is thick enough so ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and my niece loves it. Feels like a real tea set and is thick enough so that if dropped it does not break. Wonderful set!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha G.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Good sized and super cute in person. My niece loved it, she loves playing tea party.
customer_reviews.author: LRod

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set but breakable.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was breakable when I ordered this. However, I found a family that really wanted it so I donated it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Detsch Barker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Good quality, good size for playing, decently durable! My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: camgo

customer_reviews.title: Tea set review
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter absolutely loves this tea set! It's great quality and has been strong enough to survive a couple of drops! It's the perfect size and super cute design!
customer_reviews.author: shane ross

customer_reviews.title: Tea time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had manny of tea parties with my daughter and this tea party set.
customer_reviews.author: James Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a family member and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Dope_threadz

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for her granddaughter and she loved it very cute set
customer_reviews.author: faunda

customer_reviews.title: Tea for Tiny Tots
customer_reviews.text: Nice tea set for our granddaughter. Cute and made of ceramic coated china. Nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great size, not too small, and sturdy so i wasn't worried about them breaking with my 8yr old. She was super excited to get them.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of my childhood! My daughter loves this tea set.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for girls
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this gift. She couldn't wait to open and use it.
customer_reviews.author: fab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, sturdier than I expected - just the right size! Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: music teacher

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Product. I was looking for a tea set ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Product. I was looking for a tea set that was a little bigger. The tea cups are a nice size. not tiny like most others. The child I bought it for is 5 but she's size is more like 7 or 8. I am very satisfied, and would recommend this tea set.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 4 yeast old daughter! I didn't want to get get a little tiny tea set or even a normal size. This is a great size and every piece is functional, washable and durable. This has been the most used Christmas gift for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R. Small

customer_reviews.title: She is pretty easy on them but my toddler son will come ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old has had these for months now and not one has broken . She is pretty easy on them but my toddler son will come in and play as well and they have survived 😂
customer_reviews.author: Robinhood77

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My Niece Loves it! Seems to be well built and can be used to drink from and can be used on the top rack of the Dishwasher without damaging the cups.
customer_reviews.author: TechieSeb

customer_reviews.title: Happiness.... 3 with tea...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it; she plays make believe- tea party, everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and perfect for little girls playing tea parties
customer_reviews.author: Esta G. Bolint

customer_reviews.title: Cute print, Bad shipping/packing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tea set for my daughter! However, when it was packaged for shipping- there was no bubble wrap! When we received it- I could hear glass moving around inside. Upon opening, one of the cups was broken into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This tea set is adorable! It is well made and fun to use. You won’t regret buying it. Both boys and girls will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J Smiths iOS

customer_reviews.title: 4 Broken Pieces in the Set
customer_reviews.text: While the set was very cute, 4 of the major pcs. were broken (2 plates, teapot handle, and the creamer). I gave it as a gift so I couldn't tell the pieces were broken until the gift was opened by the recipient. Overall, not a great experience with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Moiseve

customer_reviews.title: Tea time!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little ceramic tea set. My daughter loves playing with it. It is made well and the pieces are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for the adults playing tea party with their kids
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tea set for Christmas for my 3 yo and ordered this. The size is perfect for little kids but isn't too small for adults to play along. I am very happy with the quality of the product for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear05

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with tea parties. This tea set is cute and I am able to put real tea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. Ended up getting another to gift.
customer_reviews.author: D's Mom

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and are just the right size for my granddaughter. I have not opened the box yet because these are a birthday gift for her in June. They will be a huge hit I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shucks9

product_meta.title: Toys Chasing Butterflies Ceramic Tea Set
feature_bullets: 13 piece ceramic tea service with a butterfly theme
A whimsical twist on a classic toy
Have a party for your family member, friend or doll
Includes 4 teacups, 4 saucers, tea pot with lid, sugar bowl with lid and creamer
Recommended for children 8 years of age and older
